data_table.description: Intima Media Thickness (IMT) Carotid, Offspring Cohort Exam 6. The 2 measures collected are the mean of the mean common carotid IMT and the mean of the mean internal carotid IMT for far wall of both sides.

variable.name: cca_fw_mean_imt
variable.description: Mean of the mean common carotid IMT far wall of both sides
variable.comment: Version 1: 9-2-2009 Moved the code value "0.24-3.23" to the min and max values. Corrected "24 missing values" to read ".=missing"

variable.name: ica_fw_mean_imt
variable.description: Mean of the mean internal carotid IMT far wall both sides
variable.comment: Version 1: 9-2-2009 Moved the code value "0.17-4.17" to the min and max values. Corrected "24 missing values" to read ".=missing"
